content: About usWe are the only authors and owners of the card game, "BLACK CANVAS" - Â It was created with the goal of offering something different and unique in the casino industry. To meet the above objective Black Canvas emphasizes bringing a novel and unique card game. In keeping with its uniqueness, Black Canvas maintains legislative protection on its models, maintaining intellectual property and rights protection on its creations.TournamentWe are conducting a tournament through the participation of the community testing the Demo version of the main game. Each player will start with 100Mil chips to play, they will have to post their result on Twitter tagging us and the player with the highest winnings will win 30 USDT. There will be tournaments every 3 days and 300 USDT in total prizes.This is our main game and is only a small part of what we aim to create.
